heading: HB08285
0: AN ACT TO OFFICIALLY RECOGNIZE THE PROVINCE OF BULACAN AS THE "COOPERATIVE CAPITAL OF THE PHILIPPINES"
status: Pending with the Committee on COOPERATIVES DEVELOPMENT since 2018-09-25
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08285
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO OFFICIALLY RECOGNIZE THE PROVINCE OF BULACAN AS THE "COOPERATIVE CAPITAL OF THE PHILIPPINES"
ABSTRACT : Justifies the reason for recognition of Bulacan as the Cooperative Capital of the Philippines such that: It is the province with the greatest number of registered cooperatives and immense amount of combined assets of cooperatives; and also because it has remained in the top five (5) of all success indicators since cooperatives started in the Philippines.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON COOPERATIVES DEVELOPMENT ON 2018-09-25
